Package us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.stc

package us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.stc
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm
     
  • Class
    Description
    BatteryStatus
    Battery status for STC gate arms.
    CommandStatus
    Command status for STC gate arms.
    ControlProperty
    Control property is used to control the gate arm.
    FaultCode
    Fault codes for STC.
    FaultProperty
    Fault property reads the controller faults, errors and alerts.
    OpControlGate
    Operation to control gate arm.
    OperatorStatus
    Operator status represents the state of STC gate operator.
    OpQueryGateStatus
    Operation to query gate arm status.
    OpResetGate
    Operatoin to reset a gate arm.
    OpSTC
    Operation for STC device
    ResetProperty
    Reset property is used to reset the controller.
    StatusProperty
    Status property reads the gate arm status.
    STCPoller
    STCPoller is a java implementation of the Hysecurity STC protocol.
    STCProperty
    A property which can be sent or received from a controller.
    VersionProperty
    Version property reads the controller version.
